attributes.action: to enforce training to police officers to deal with children with disabilities
attributes.additional_details: I avea. child with Autism and after seeing footage on the news of police officer brutally assaulting a 10 year old autistic boy has made me want to fight to have the police better trained to deal with the situation of helping a child with a disability
attributes.background: to provide full training to the police enforcement in the whole of Britain  on how to help and deal with children with disabilities especially those with neurological disabilities.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Mandatory SEN and hidden disability training for NHS, care and emergency workers:
